title: Noise annoys
creator_credit: Ron Saunders and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Humorous look at the problem of excessive noise levels in an average Australian suburban street. One day the noise becomes too much for God and He intervenes. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
